name: m365-meeting-minutes-generator
title: Prepare the meeting minutes in the similar and familiar format after the meeting is completed with recordings
shortDescription: Ask copilot to generate the meeting mintues for the recorded teams meetings
longDescription: This prompt will help you generate the meeting mintues in a tabular format. It will show the meeting title, name of the attendees, meeting time and duration, discussions and action items with action assigned to column.

thumbnails.alt: Prompt for Copilot for Microsoft 365 to generate the meeting mintues in a tabular format
